memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_vcs_discover_cb) (struct bt_vcs *vcs, int err, uint8_t vocs_count, uint8_t aics_count)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_vcs *vcs, int err, uint8_t vocs_count, uint8_t aics_count)
memberdef.name: bt_vcs_discover_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for bt_vcs_discover.

detaileddescription.para: This callback is only used for the client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value.
Number of Volume Offset Control Service instances on peer device.
Number of Audio Input Control Service instances on peer device.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_vcs_state_cb) (struct bt_vcs *vcs, int err, uint8_t volume, uint8_t mute)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_vcs *vcs, int err, uint8_t volume, uint8_t mute)
memberdef.name: bt_vcs_state_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for Volume Control Service volume state.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is locally read as the server. Called when the value is remotely read as the client. Called if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value.
The volume of the Volume Control Service server.
The mute setting of the Volume Control Service server.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_vcs_flags_cb) (struct bt_vcs *vcs, int err, uint8_t flags)
memberdef.name: bt_vcs_flags_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for Volume Control Service flags.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is locally read as the server. Called when the value is remotely read as the client. Called if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value.
The flags of the Volume Control Service server.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_vcs_write_cb) (struct bt_vcs *vcs, int err)
memberdef.name: bt_vcs_write_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for writes.

detaileddescription.para: This callback is only used for the client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on fail.

briefdescription.para: Register the Volume Control Service.

detaileddescription.para: This will register and enable the service and make it discoverable by clients.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the registered Volume Control Service. This will still be valid if the return value is -EALREADY.

briefdescription.para: Get Volume Control Service included services.

detaileddescription.para: Returns a pointer to a struct that contains information about the Volume Control Service included service instances, such as pointers to the Volume Offset Control Service (Volume Offset Control Service) or Audio Input Control Service (AICS) instances.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to store the result in.

briefdescription.para: Get the connection pointer of a client instance.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Bluetooth connection pointer of a Volume Control Service client instance.

parameterdescription.para: Volume Control Service client instance pointer.

briefdescription.para: Discover Volume Control Service and included services.

detaileddescription.para: This will start a GATT discovery and setup handles and subscriptions. This shall be called once before any other actions can be executed for the peer device, and the bt_vcs_discover_cb callback will notify when it is possible to start remote operations.
This shall only be done as the client,

parameterdescription.para: The connection to discover Volume Control Service for.
Valid remote instance object on success.

briefdescription.para: Set the Volume Control Service volume step size.

detaileddescription.para: Set the value that the volume changes, when changed relatively with e.g. bt_vcs_vol_down or bt_vcs_vol_up.
This can only be done as the server.

briefdescription.para: Read the Volume Control Service volume state.
Read the Volume Control Service flags.
Turn the volume down by one step on the server.
Turn the volume up by one step on the server.
Turn the volume down and unmute the server.
Turn the volume up and unmute the server.
Set the volume on the server.
Unmute the server.
Mute the server.
Read the Volume Offset Control Service offset state.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Volume Offset Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Read the Volume Offset Control Service location.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Volume Offset Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set the Volume Offset Control Service location.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Volume Offset Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set the Volume Offset Control Service offset state.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Volume Offset Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Read the Volume Offset Control Service output description.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Volume Offset Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set the Volume Offset Control Service description.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Volume Offset Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Deactivates an Audio Input Control Service instance.

detaileddescription.para: Audio Input Control Services are activated by default, but this will allow the server to deactivate an Audio Input Control Service.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Activates an Audio Input Control Service instance.

detaileddescription.para: Audio Input Control Services are activated by default, but this will allow the server to reactivate an Audio Input Control Service instance after it has been deactivated with bt_vcs_aics_deactivate.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service input state.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service gain settings.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service input type.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service input status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Mute the Audio Input Control Service input.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Unmute the Audio Input Control Service input.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set input gain to manual.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set the input gain to automatic.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set the input gain.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.
The gain in dB to set (-128 to 127).

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service description.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Set the Audio Input Control Service description.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Audio Input Control Service instance.

briefdescription.para: Registers the callbacks used by the Volume Control Service client.
Volume Control Service (VCS)

detaileddescription.para: [Experimental] Users should note that the APIs can change as a part of ongoing development.
